title: Revenge
description: After 365 days on the run, Cal Ormond is finally back with his family and friends, and life seems good. But one night, Cal receives a mysterious message - 30 days. Is it a real warning, or a hoax? Has his terrifying past returned to haunt him?When Cal suddenly disappears, his friends don't know what to think. Have the paparazzi driven him away, or will the truth prove to be far more sinister? Will they find him before it's too late?The clock is ticking. Any second could be his last. Callum Ormond has been warned.He has 30 days.The countdown has begun...
author: Gabrielle Lord
